text: bhumiyehi movun samcaraya kara, movunta vada itamat saktivantayin vasayen siti movunta pera sitiyavunge avasanaya kese vuyeda yanna dække nædda? (pera sitiya aya kopamanado saktivantayin vasayen sitiyada, allahge danduvamen berimata nohæki viya. mandayat) ahashi ho bhumiyehi ho æti kisivak allahva parajaya kirimata nohæka. niyata vasayenma allah (siyalla) hondin danneku ha itamat balasampannayeku vasayen sitinneya
